title: My problem with the ranking system
body:
Hey Riot in the last in 4 out of the last 8 ranked games I played I had and afk in my team. And when i say an afk, they all left the games pre 5 min mark. Of course we lost all of the games which resulted in me getting demoted to Gold 3. Now that I have hit Gold 2 again, being at 0 LP ur giving me another afk in my team? I want to know wheither ur fucking with me ot its just the way ur system works? Why should these games take from my LP when its immposible to win?
Please have ur shit fix ( im rly tilted atm )
here's some evidence
https://ibb.co/di1vEv
https://ibb.co/fSk0ga
https://ibb.co/juOLga

replies.body:
We're definitely not purposely pairing you up with people who would AFK, that'd be pretty heckin' lame right? The system tries to pair up those who have similar rank and MMR

If those players are AFKing early enough in ranked matches, you should be able to start a [**/remake**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686) as long as all of the conditions are met.

But wait thats nor all
It seems like u rly want me to lose right
https://ibb.co/ksrBnF
ur getting rly hard into debt to me in terms of LP btw

Well we, as a team, never had a chance to remake. I think it was becaus they would leave and recconect several times before dissconnecting forever(however, these games clearly were 4v5s). Except for the Nasus game, he just left at 2:50 or something like that and we didnt get the chance to remake.
Thanks for the answer.
